word: H6206 - עָרַץ - ʻârats - aw-rats' - Be affrighted - பயப்படு

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - பலவந்தஞ்செய், தத்தளிக்கப்பண்ணு, பயப்படு, திகை, நொறுக்கு, நேரிடு, அச்சமாயிரு, பயங்கரம்
to tremble, to dread, to fear, to oppress, to prevail, to break, to be terrified, to cause to tremble
1) to cause to tremble, to terrify
b) (Niphal) to be awesome, to be terrible
1) to regard or treat with awe, to regard or treat as awful
2) to inspire wth awe, to terrify

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to awe or (intransitively) to dread; hence to harass: - be affrighted (afraid, dread, feared, terrified), break, dread, fear, oppress, prevail, shake terribly.
Cognate: H4637, H6178, H6184, H6206
